title: Is there a better place to find teams?
body: This whole recruitment page is dead honestly, you get multiple views on your post but hardly any comments. Is there any OCE webpage, reddit or discord that is used for looking for teams?

replies.body: There's a Facebook page (https://www.facebook.com/groups/1493872640873257/) and a Discord channel.
That facebook link doesn't work and is there a link to this discord?

Someone mentioned Discord? :)

https://discord.me/lolchat

And the Facebook link has a parenthesis embedded. You just have to remove it:
https://www.facebook.com/groups/1493872640873257/

And here's another Melby group that I'm also in: https://www.facebook.com/groups/LeagueOfLegandsMelbourne
Istezz mate, come back we miss you https://discord.gg/k5twXBA ily mute lord
